page.title: 03FACILITIES IN BLAYDON (2)
page.content: LIBRARIES: There are two libraries, one in Blaydon and one in Winlaton.Blaydon library is the largest and is forty years old.Librarian Angela Parker said there were 15,441 books in the library. Over 10,000 are fiction and there are 16,000 junior books. The library also lends out records and tapes. It has a seperate room called the Ridley Room for parties, displays and coffee mornings. A toddlers group meets in the room on Fridays. Pets accompany the children,as a method used by the library to put the children at ease.
